title: Top Places to visit in Kutch, Bhuj, Gujarat
content: Kutch district is a district of Gujarat state in western India. Covering an area of 45,674 km², it is the largest district of India. The population of Kutch is about 2,092,000. It has 10 Talukas, 939 villages, and 6 Municipalities. The Kutch district is home to the Kutchi people who speak th
